FAQ

What is Craft Signals?
A binary options signals provider offering over 94% accuracy, available 24/7, including the OTC market.

How to Access Signals?
Download the Craft Signals extension via Google Chrome for immediate access.

Broker Compatibility?
Compatible with all binary options brokers, customizable for 1-minute and 5-minute timeframes.

When Are Signals Sent?
24/7 availability with specific timings for the standard and OTC markets.

Use in Forex Market?
No, signals are for binary options trading only.

Martingale Strategy?
Occasionally used up to level 2. Practice on a demo account if unfamiliar.

Enhance your binary options trading with Craft Signals and start succeeding today.

Responsible Marketing and Monetization:
Craft Signals is an affiliate of several binary options brokers. All recommended brokers include our affiliate link.
